title: 4.2 Master Challenge 3
question: Imagine you have a simple procedure square(x) that returns the square of a number. Modify this procedure to become power(x, y) that returns the x raised to the power y .Write the pseudocode for the generalized power(x, y) procedure and illustrate how it can be called with different arguments. Implement the same using JavaScript.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
